comment: Description: Extract IPs from Infoblox's DNS query logging (response logging actually)

Sample Log: 2018-06-18 17:07:34     10.68.1.13     30      named   18-Jun-2018 17:07:34.171 client 10.17.159.198#65129: UDP: query: 23-courier.push.apple.com IN A response: NOERROR + 23-courier.push.apple.com. 26473 IN CNAME 23.courier-push-apple.com.akadns.net.; 23.courier-push-apple.com.akadns.net. 17 IN CNAME pop-namer-ne-courier.push-apple.com.akadns.net.; pop-namer-ne-courier.push-apple.com.akadns.net. 5 IN A 10.249.108.32; pop-namer-ne-courier.push-apple.com.akadns.net. 5 IN A 10.249.108.19; pop-namer-ne-courier.push-apple.com.akadns.net. 5 IN A 10.249.108.71; pop-namer-ne-courier.push-apple.com.akadns.net. 5 IN A 10.249.108.16; pop-namer-ne-courier.push-apple.com.akadns.net. 5 IN A 10.249.108.69; pop-namer-ne-courier.push-apple.com.akadns.net. 5 IN A 10.249.108.33; pop-namer-ne-courier.push-apple.com.akadns.net. 5 IN A 10.249.108.27; pop-namer-ne-courier.push-apple.com.akadns.net. 5 IN A 10.249.108.99;
